spell.name: Cut
spell.text: You choose two visible points in space no more than 10 ft. apart. You make a ranged spell attack against any creature that moves through the line created by these points. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 force damage. The damage increases by one die when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

spell.name: Projectile Shield
spell.text: When targeted by a ranged attack, create an arcane barrier that grants resistance to damage from ranged attacks. As part of the reaction, you can reduce the damage by 3d6.
At Higher Levels: When cast using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage reduction increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.
